PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(85) ... Mar. 3 月 marabou 鹳 maraca 沙球.
尾部 : 4根棕黄色斑马条纹蓑毛, 棕色鹳毛(Marabou), 亮条(Flashabou)腿部: 棕色橡皮脚其它:涂料(Acrylic paint), 即时贴眼睛或3D眼.
仿佛为了与之遥相呼应，下午一出门，迎接我们的，就是无数秃鹫和马拉布鹳（marabou）。我原来不知道鹳也有食腐的，但看马拉 …
一种叫马拉布（marabou）的秃鹫刚吃完腐尸安博塞利的腹地，有一片很大的湿地，环形围绕在广阔在草原中心，各种水鸟叽喳地飞 …

list.abs: 一种很大很黑的鹳鸟（MARABOU STORK），头很秃，嘴很长，并不成群。好多只零零落落的散落草地里，慵懒的在舔自己的羽毛。
海盗游世界:和谐低碳国肯尼亚之行摄旅程... ... 18.Lizard 蜥蜴 19.Marabou Stork 非洲秃鹮 20.Martial eagle 武术鹰.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from Arabic murābiṭ 'holy man' (see also marabout), the stork being regarded as holy

means.word_mean: 1. large African black-and-white carrion-eating stork; downy under-wing feathers are used to trim garments
2. downy feathers of marabou storks used for trimming garments

auth_sentence.content: Today in Kilelengwani, Marabou storks circle the carcasses of cows scattered between the remains of still-smoldering homes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today in Kilelengwani, Marabou storks circle the carcasses of cows scattered between the remains of still-smoldering homes.
